body.name: Gaming Desk with Led Lights and Power Outlets,47 Inch Computer Desk with Storage Drawers,Monitor Stand and Pc Holder for Small Space,Home Office,Bedroom,White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 18 hrs 17 mins
features: Computer Desk with Wooden Drawers: Drawer dimension is 13.67"Lx15.74"Wx5.11"H,provides ample storage space for your small computer desk essentials, making it perfect for small spaces like bedrooms or home offices

Gaming Desk with Led Lights:The LED lighting with 10 colors, 29 lighting modes,dimmable brightness and flicker frequencies to create beautiful ambiance that enhances your room and fully immerse yourself in the game, APP are optional for easy use of led
Small Desk with Power Outlet: Come with 2 built-in outlets and 2 USB ports for convenient charging of pad, phone, pc monitor, gaming gear and lamp etc,its great convenience for gaming or home office

Multi-Functional Monitor Stand: Desk with moveable monitor shelf is an ergonomic design, provides a comfortable angle within your line of sight when you sit down and start work or play pc gaming, the monitor shelf for additional storage and organization options, keeping your desk clutter-free and maximizing your available space

Easy Assembly: Lkeiyay computer desk come with necessary tools and instructions,each parts are clearly labeled,just following instructions step-by-step,it will be able to install this desk within 1 hour

100% Customer Guarantee: If you have problem with Lkeiyay Computer Desk, we will give you full refund, If you are not satisfied during use, feel your free to contact us anytime within 12 months, thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a small but functional desk...
reviews.reviewText: With dimensions of 19.68 x 44.87, this is a small desk. It has a small fabric drawer, led lights, 2 AC power outlets and 2 USB ports. Very easy to assemble compact desk ideal for students. It's quite low priced for this season!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth for Money
reviews.reviewText: Difficult to assemble. Screws are missing. Instruction mention few code to find hardwares. Most of the hardware is in the same bag difficult to identify. If you tight more wood will damage. Few threads are damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: perfect size for a smaller room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Missing pieces, poorly made, poor material.
reviews.reviewText: I was hoping to get a decent deal on this product since the brand I wanted didn't have this style of desk, sadly even at $99 it's barely worth that.First, I opened the package and I'm missing a screw. Luckily I have some I can substitute in.Second issue was the piece that holds the drawer was bent and I had to use pliers to somewhat bend it back.Third is I couldn't tighten the screws into the wood without it bending/cracking the wood.Overall I'm extremely disappointed as this is a gift for my spouse and I'm just hoping he doesn't notice. I am writing this review at the time I'm building it. If I can revise or things get worse/better I will update.Update:Amazon offered $20 credit for the issues. As I progress I'm not sure that was even worth it.The drawer pieces were incorrect and also added a picture showing the gap of the drawer being uneven. Unsure if that's from the material or the bent metal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pure JUNK - zero stars
reviews.reviewText: As you can see from the photos, this desk has many chips. The drawer does not work. I cannot open it. There is an electrical problem with the light. It flickers when I touch the wire. The desk looks terrible and if you have a laptop without a separate keyboard, you really can't put the laptop on the desk because there isn't enough room because of the monitor stand/pedestal. Overall, this was a truly a piece of junk to put together and it was crappy just taking the pieces out of the box. Save you money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful & Easy to Assemble & Space Saving & High Quality
reviews.reviewText: This desk desk is the perfect size. We were looking for a small desk to fit a tight space. This desk is beautiful. Modern and sleek. Minimalist yet fully functional. Super happy. It has a drawer that fits a lot plus a bottom shelf for a desktop computer or more storage. It includes a movable console shelf too. This desk has it all. Easy to assemble in about 20 minutes. Strong and durable. Our favorite feature, that we did not originally see, is the lights. The desk has a light with 10 different colors and multiple modes. Super beautiful. It creates a peaceful work environment or you can create a light show when gaming. Ambiance is wonderful. It also includes 2 outlets and 2 USB outlets. Awesome. Super functional. Would definitely highly recommend this high quality and useful desk. Overall, we are giving this fun and strong desk ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Average quality, difficult assembly
reviews.reviewText: We ordered this for my 7 year olds room without the intent of using it as a gaming desk. I started three assembly and it was a STRUGGLE. I tend to be able to put things together well enough and this was very frustrating. I only got through step 3 with difficulty until the hex key it came with was stripped and I had to pause. My husband, who is very handy, finished the assembly later and also said it was challenging and the quality was average at best. It isn't easy to install without a second person to hold things in place either. Ultimately the end result is a decent looking, sturdy enough desk with a fun light (remote included). Our daughter was thrilled but it was definitely a frustrating piece to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good desk for the price
reviews.reviewText: The Lkeiyay Desk is a fantastic value for its price, offering a range of features perfect for gaming, home office, or bedroom use. With built-in wood drawers, ample storage space, a power outlet, monitor stand, and LED lights, it covers a lot of functionality.However, one drawback to note is that the drawer can be a bit challenging to slide smoothly. It occasionally gets stuck on the structural bolts, which can be a minor inconvenience.Overall, if you're looking for an affordable and feature-packed desk, the Lkeiyay Computer Desk is a great choice, with the only minor drawback being the drawer's occasional sliding difficulty.
